TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit LogStore extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public NotInheritable Class LogStore Implements IDisposable
public ref class LogStore sealed : IDisposable

summary.span: 代表記錄結構化儲存區。

span.span: Represents a log-structured storage.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會在一般記錄檔系統 (CLFS) 記錄頂端提供記錄順序介面實作。The class provides an implementation of the record sequence interface on top of a Common Log File System (CLFS) log. 它會搭配使用 類別，這個類別會提供用來直接操作和管理 CLFS 記錄檔的介面。It works with the class, which provides an interface for directly manipulating and managing a CLFS log file. 記錄存放區會在一組延伸磁碟區中提供僅能附加的儲存區。A log store provides append-only storage across a set of disk extents. 類別代表這個儲存區，並且提供用來加入和移除容器、設定原則以及建立封存檔的方法，The class represents this storage, and provides methods for adding and removing containers, setting policy, and creating archives. 但是不提供讀取和寫入儲存區的方法；這些方法會由 類別提供。It does not provide methods for reading from and writing to the storage; these methods are provided by the class. 類別與 類別的關係就如同磁碟檔案與 物件的關係。The relationship between the class and the class is similar to the relationship between a disk file and a object. 磁碟檔案提供實際的儲存區且具有「長度」和「上次存取時間」等屬性，而 物件則提供檔案的檢視，可用來讀取和寫入檔案。The disk file provides the actual storage and has attributes such as length and last access time, while the object provides a view on the file that can be used to read from it and write to it. 同樣地， 類別也具有原則和延伸磁碟區集合等屬性，而 類別則會提供用來讀取和寫入資料的記錄導向機制。Similarly, the class has attributes like a policy and a collection of disk extents, and the class provides a record-oriented mechanism for reading and writing data. 與 類別所代表的檔案記錄順序不同， 執行個體會將它的資料儲存在 執行個體所代表的延伸磁碟區集合中。Unlike the file record sequence represented by the class, a instance stores its data in a collection of disk extents, represented by instances. 指定 執行個體中的延伸區大小均等，而在 執行個體中新增和移除空間時，將會以延伸區累加的方式來進行。The extents in a given instance are all of uniform size, and space is added to and removed from a instance in extent increments. 若要新增及移除延伸記錄區，請使用 物件的 和 方法，這個物件可以由 屬性傳回。To add and remove log extents, use the and methods of the object, which can be returned by the property. 執行個體可能會有與它相關聯的原則。A instance can have policies associated with it. 這些原則是以可由 屬性傳回的 執行個體來代表。These are represented by instances that can be returned by the property. 原則會規定記錄檔所要遵循的規則，例如延伸區的數目上限和大小下限，以及在特定條件下擴大或縮小 的相關指示。A policy dictates rules that the log will attempt to follow, such as maximum number of extents and minimum size, and instructions on growing or shrinking the under certain conditions. 此外，您還可以指定是否可以封存 執行個體。In addition, you can specify whether a instance can be archived. 原則是針對個別記錄檔設定的，而且是變動的 (Volatile)，代表一旦關閉記錄檔的所有控制代碼，就不再會有原則存在。Policies are set per log and are volatile, which means that once every handle to the log is closed, the policy no longer exists. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何將 封存至 XML 文件。The following example shows how to archive a to an XML document. [!code-csharp[logarchievesnapshot#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/logarchievesnapshot/cs/logarchievesnapshot.cs#0)] [!code-vb[logarchievesnapshot#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/logarchievesnapshot/vb/logarchievesnapshot.vb#0)]

span.span: The log handle could not be bound to the thread pool.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string path, valuetype System.IO.FileMode mode) cil managed
Public Sub New (path As String, mode As FileMode)

param.name: path
param.span: 要開啟之記錄存放區基底檔案的相對或絕對路徑。

span.span: A relative or absolute path for the base file of the log store to open.

param.name: mode
param.span: 其中一個 值，可決定如何開啟或建立存放區。

span.span: One of the values that determines how to open or create the store.

summary.span: 使用指定的路徑和模式初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified path and mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式，以指定的路徑和模式來開啟記錄存放區。Use this constructor to open a log store with the specified path and mode. 存放區便會以讀取/寫入權限開啟，並且共用讀取權限。The store is opened with read/write access, and shares read access. `path` 參數應使用下列語法：The `path` parameter should use the following syntax: `log:[::]` 其中 `` 是記錄檔的有效路徑，而 `` 則是唯一的用戶端識別項。where `` is a valid path to a log file, and `` is a unique client identifier. 記錄存放區必須是實體記錄存放區或虛擬記錄存放區，但不會同時為這兩者。A log store should be either a physical log store or a virtual log store, but not both. 一旦建立實體或虛擬記錄存放區，其狀態就會永久保持不變。Once a log store has been created physically or virtually, it remains so for its lifetime. 實體記錄存放區的建立方式是單獨指定實體記錄名稱。A physical log store is created by specifying only the physical log name. 虛擬記錄存放區的建立方式是同時指定實體記錄名稱和記錄用戶端名稱。A virtual log store is created by specifying both the physical log name and the log client name. 實體記錄名稱相同的用戶端，其延伸區集合和原則也會相同。Clients that share the same physical log name share the same extents collection and policy.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式，以指定的路徑、模式和存取權限來開啟新的記錄存放區。Use this constructor to open a new log store with the specified path, mode, and access. 存放區便會開啟，並且共用讀取權限。The store is opened sharing read access. `path` 參數應使用下列語法：The `path` parameter should use the following syntax: `log:[::]` 其中 `` 是記錄檔的有效路徑，而 `` 則是唯一的用戶端識別項。where `` is a valid path to a log file, and `` is a unique client identifier. 記錄存放區必須是實體記錄存放區或虛擬記錄存放區，但不會同時為這兩者。A log store should be either a physical log store or a virtual log store, but not both. 一旦建立實體或虛擬記錄存放區，其狀態就會永久保持不變。Once a log store has been created physically or virtually, it remains so for its lifetime. 實體記錄存放區的建立方式是單獨指定實體記錄名稱。A physical log store is created by specifying only the physical log name. 虛擬記錄存放區的建立方式是同時指定實體記錄名稱和記錄用戶端名稱。A virtual log store is created by specifying both the physical log name and the log client name. 實體記錄名稱相同的用戶端，其延伸區集合和原則也會相同。Clients that share the same physical log name share the same extents collection and policy.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會初始化新的 物件，而這個物件是以指定的路徑、模式和存取權限所開啟的。This constructor initializes a new object that it opens with the specified path, mode, and access. 存放區會開啟，並且共用指定的存取權限。The store is opened sharing the specified access. `path` 參數應使用下列語法：The `path` parameter should use the following syntax: `log:[::]` 其中 `` 是記錄檔的有效路徑，而 `` 則是唯一的用戶端識別項。where `` is a valid path to a log file, and `` is a unique client identifier. 記錄存放區必須是實體記錄存放區或虛擬記錄存放區，但不會同時為這兩者。A log store should be either a physical log store or a virtual log store, but not both. 一旦建立實體或虛擬記錄存放區，其狀態就會永久保持不變。Once a log store has been created physically or virtually, it remains so for its lifetime. 實體記錄存放區的建立方式是單獨指定實體記錄名稱。A physical log store is created by specifying only the physical log name. 虛擬記錄存放區的建立方式是同時指定實體記錄名稱和記錄用戶端名稱。A virtual log store is created by specifying both the physical log name and the log client name. 實體記錄名稱相同的用戶端，其延伸區集合和原則也會相同。Clients that share the same physical log name share the same extents collection and policy.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會初始化新的 物件，而這個物件是以指定的路徑、模式和存取權限所開啟的。This constructor initializes a new object that it opens with the specified path, mode, and access. 存放區會開啟，並且共用指定的存取權限。The store is opened sharing the specified access. `path` 參數應遵循下列語法：The `path` parameter should follow the following syntax: `log:[::]` 其中 `` 是記錄檔的有效路徑，而 `` 則是唯一的用戶端識別項。where `` is a valid path to a log file, and `` is a unique client identifier. 記錄存放區必須是實體記錄存放區或虛擬記錄存放區，但不會同時為這兩者。A log store should be either a physical log store or a virtual log store, but not both. 一旦建立實體或虛擬記錄存放區，其狀態就會永久保持不變。Once a log store has been created physically or virtually, it remains so for its lifetime. 實體記錄存放區的建立方式是單獨指定實體記錄名稱。A physical log store is created by specifying only the physical log name. 虛擬記錄存放區的建立方式是同時指定實體記錄名稱和記錄用戶端名稱。A virtual log store is created by specifying both the physical log name and the log client name. 實體記錄名稱相同的用戶端，其延伸區集合和原則也會相同。Clients that share the same physical log name share the same extents collection and policy.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.IO.Log.LogArchiveSnapshot CreateLogArchiveSnapshot (System.IO.Log.SequenceNumber first, System.IO.Log.SequenceNumber last);

.method public hidebysig instance class System.IO.Log.LogArchiveSnapshot CreateLogArchiveSnapshot(valuetype System.IO.Log.SequenceNumber first, valuetype System.IO.Log.SequenceNumber last) cil managed
Public Function CreateLogArchiveSnapshot (first As SequenceNumber, last As SequenceNumber) As LogArchiveSnapshot

param.name: first
param.span: 要封存之範圍的起始序號。

span.span: The starting sequence number in the range to archive.

param.name: last
param.span: 要封存之範圍的結束序號。

span.span: The ending sequence number in the range to archive.

summary.span: 取得介於指定之序號間的記錄存放區狀態快照 (Snapshot)，以便製作備份。

span.span: Takes a snapshot of the log store state between the specified sequence numbers for making a backup.

returns.span: 物件，其中包含製作封存檔所需的狀態。

span.span: A object that contains the state necessary to make an archive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法所傳回的封存快照 (Snapshot) 包含由基底序號或封存序號 (較小者) 到最後一個序號的資訊，The archive snapshot returned from this method encompasses information from either the base sequence number or the archive sequence number, whichever is lower, to the last sequence number. 其中不含最後一個序號，代表封存檔只包含直到最後一個之前的所有記錄。It is not inclusive for the last sequence number, which means that the archive only includes records up to but not including last. 此外，使用這個方法時，起始的 SequenceNumber 必須等於 BaseSequenceNumber，才能讓這個封存保持一致。In addition, when using this method, the start SequenceNumber must be equal to the BaseSequenceNumber in order for the archive to be consistent.

exception.span: 或 不是介於這個順序的基底序號和最後一個序號之間。

span.span: or is not between the base and last sequence numbers of this sequence.

exception.span: 大於 。

span.span: is larger than .

span.span: There is not enough memory to continue the execution of a program.

exception.span: 記錄順序已滿。

span.span: The record sequence is full.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的所有資源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用完畢時，請呼叫 。Call when you have finished using the . 方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 在呼叫 後，您必須釋放所有對 的參考，讓記憶體回收行程可以取回 佔用的記憶體。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. > [!NOTE] > 在您釋放最後一個 參考之前，請務必呼叫 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 物件的 `Finalize` 方法。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Extents As LogExtentCollection
public: property System::IO::Log::LogExtentCollection ^ Extents { System::IO::Log::LogExtentCollection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得包含這個記錄存放區資料的延伸記錄區集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of log extents that contain the data for this log store.

value.span: 執行個體，其中包含封裝這個記錄存放區資料的延伸記錄區集合。

span.span: A instance containing the collection of log extents that encapsulates data for this log store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行個體會將它的資料儲存在 執行個體所代表的延伸磁碟區集合中。A instance stores its data in a collection of disk extents, represented by instances. 指定 執行個體中的延伸區大小均等，而在 執行個體中新增和移除空間時，將會以延伸區累加的方式來進行。The extents in a given instance are all of uniform size, and space is added to and removed from a instance in extent increments. 若要新增及移除延伸記錄區，請使用 物件的 和 方法，這個物件是由這個屬性所傳回的。To add and remove log extents, use the and methods of the object, which is returned by this property.

summary.span: 取得記錄存放區的大小 (以位元組為單位)。

span.span: Gets the size of the log store, in bytes.

value.span: 記錄存放區的大小 (以位元組為單位)。

span.span: The size of the log store, in bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 記錄存放區的大小是延伸記錄區大小的總和。The size of the log store is the sum of the sizes of the log extents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性所傳回的 執行個體，檢查和操作與這個 相關聯的記錄原則。You can use the instance returned by this property to examine and manipulate the log policy associated with this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基底序號和封存結尾這兩者中較小的，會決定記錄檔的結尾。The smaller of the base sequence number and the archive tail determines the tail of the log. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何將 封存至 XML 文件。The following example shows how to archive a to an XML document.
